vyadhati：[=vedhati＜vyath] ふるえる，動揺す，震動す．aor．vyadhasi； caus．vyadheti，vyādheti，byādheti 恐れさす，ふるえさす，悩ます．

Vyadhati，[in poetry for the usual vedhati of vyath，cp．Goth．wipōn] to tremble，shake，waver； to be frightened Vin．II，202 （so for vyādhati）； J．III，398 （vyadhase； C．vyadhasi=kampasi）．-- Caus．vyadheti （& vyādheti） to frighten，confuse J．IV，166 （=vyādheti bādheti C．）．-- Fut．vyādhayissati S．I，120=Th．1，46 （by°）．Under byādheti we had given a different derivation （viz．Caus．fr．vyādhi）．（Page 653）
